My kids are looking at colleges; this aggregates information that may be useful for them but which is harder to get from existing websites.

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source("_packages.R")
source("R/functions.R")
tar_load(overview)

DT::datatable(overview, rownames=FALSE, filter="top", escape=FALSE, extensions = 'Buttons', options = list(
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'),
	pageLength = 100
  )
) %>% formatPercentage(c("Yield", "Admission", "Graduation", "First year retention", "Walkability"), 0)
```
